tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_conservation_program (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    progress INT,
    achievements VARCHAR(500)
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    achievement_date TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(id)
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  date DATE,
  completed_steps INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
  achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  description TEXT,
  date_achieved DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT REFERENCES participants(id),
    achievement_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    achievement_date DATE,
    achievement_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE programs (
    program_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    difficulty_level INT,
    program_id INT REFERENCES programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT REFERENCES participants(participant_id),
    activity_id INT REFERENCES activities(activity_id),
    completion_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
